captions._001: Pokemon Trainer Red poses with his team consisting of final evolutions of the three starters, Snorlax, Lapras, and, of course, his trusty Pikachu.
captions._010: All of these Pokemon share a few traits: Frail, relatively low powered Pokemon who all have access to the ability Prankster. Prankster gives +1 priority to any non-damaging move, this becoming one of the best abilities a support Pokemon could have. This is a 3-line caption, which the maximum.
